homeHeroSection.title: Transform Your Special Moments With Mehndi Artistry.
homeHeroSection.description: Experience the artistry of traditional henna with a modern touch.

makeUsSpecial.title: Here to make your occasions special
makeUsSpecial.description: From bridal parties to festival gatherings, each art is customized according to each client's needs and preferences. Quality and attention to detail are absolute commitments to giving every one of these henna applications a last impression.

aboutUs.subTitle: welcome to
aboutUs.title: About The Artist
aboutUs.description: Janki is a professional mehndi artist, based in Ahmedabad who takes immense pride in being part of this ancient artwork of henna, with 10 years of experience, specializing in the rich cultural heritage of mehndi art.
aboutUs.sortDescription: Her expertise spans from traditional mehndi to western style, covering a broader range of design patterns and styles.

memories.subTitle: SPECIALS
memories.title: We’re Here to Make Your Day Memorable

services.subTitle: our services
services.title: What We Can Do for You
services.description: Our specialized front hand, back hand, full hand mehndi designs, where traditional circular patterns meet innovative artistic elements.

items.title: Bridal Mehndi
items.description: Wonderful henna designs that tell the essence of your love story.
points: Complete hands, arms, and feet coverage

items.title: Engagement Mehandi
items.description: connect individuals with the divine or seek blessings.
points: Complete hands, arms, and feet coverage

items.title: Party Mehandi
items.description: incorporates diverse styles, including floral and artistic motif

items.title: Simple Mehndi Designs
items.description: Simple and minimal henna designs perfect for parties or everyday elegance.

items.title: Festival Mehndi
items.description: Whether it's for Diwali, Eid, or any other special occasion, my artistry will help you make a lasting impression.

items.title: Mehndi Tattoo Art
items.description: Custom henna-inspired temporary tattoos. Perfect for music parties, or everyday self-expression.

items.title: Arabic Mehendi Design
items.description: Arabic henna art, with intricate symmetry and rich symbolism creating mesmerizing designs.

items.title: Character Mehndi Design
items.description: Whimsical illustrations, mythical creatures, or iconic pop culture figures, breathing work of art.

whyChooseUs.subTitle: why us
whyChooseUs.title: What Makes Us Special?
whyChooseUs.description: Transform your imagination into wearable art with our unique mehndi designs.

testimonials.subTitle: Testimonials
testimonials.title: Our Happy Customers
testimonials.name: Priya S.
testimonials.description: While hiring a professional henna artist I came across Janki, her portfolio is amazing as she creates stunning and fine designs with perfection which increased the extravaganza of my Diwali festival. Highly recommend!

testimonials.subTitle: Testimonials
testimonials.title: Our Happy Customers
testimonials.name: Tina K.
testimonials.description: Every bride deserves perfection, and so I searched for someone who can do it perfectly. Janki really showcased the aesthetics of the bridal henna and I was the queen at my wedding!

testimonials.subTitle: Testimonials
testimonials.title: Our Happy Customers
testimonials.name: Neha H.
testimonials.description: Never will I ever look for another henna artist again, Janki has set the benchmark. And it’s not just her skills but her charm that makes the whole experience so nice. The pleasant attitude and her passion for things made my life so easy.
